stories.original_headline: Next gen cancer drug shows surprising anti aging power
stories.original_summary: A next-generation drug tested in yeast was found to extend lifespan and slow aging by influencing a major growth-control pathway. Researchers also uncovered an unexpected role for agmatinases, enzymes that help keep this pathway in balance. Diet and gut microbes may affect aging more than expected b
stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Brew Elixir of Youth: Longer Life Possible!
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Alchemists' Guild has unveiled a remarkable new potion! Tested on magical fungi, this elixir was found to extend one's years and slow the effects of time by influencing vital energy pathways. They also discovered tiny spirits that help balance these paths. It seems what one consumes and the hidden creatures within may affect aging more than expected.

stories.fantasy_headline: Ancient Wisdom: Everyday Foods Guard the Heart's Vital Beat!
stories.fantasy_story: The Wizards of the Healing Arts have revealed a potent charm for the heart, hidden within everyday provisions. Regular feasting on special foods like herbal brews, forest berries, mighty nuts, and grains of the earth can significantly aid the vigor of one's inner drum. A long vigil over many souls showed those who ate these provisions consistently had stronger life-currents and cleaner vital humours.

stories.fantasy_headline: New Enchanted Game-Glove Holds Longer Magical Charge!
